hotels.name: THE OBEROI UDAIVILAS
hotels.description: Experience a perfect resort villa stay here at The Oberoi Udaivilas Udaipur Hotel. Conveniently situated in the Lake City part of Udaipur, this property puts you close to attractions and interesting dining options. Don't leave before paying a visit to the famous City Palace of Udaipur.Rated with 5 stars, this high-quality property provides guests with access to massage, restaurant and fitness center on-site.

room_types.r2: Premier Rooms with Balcony : 65 square meter
room_types.r4: Deluxe Suites with Balcony : 92 square meter

reviews.name: Ashok
reviews.comments: The best....Udaivillas is an experience. You can't stop praising . The staff are so polite and helpful and always at their humble service . Aman , Ruturaj, Ishan, Jerin, Athi, Swapna , Rishabh, Harsh. Take the name and they are all so helpful. We were nostalgic on leaving the hotel and their hospitality . The food was mouth watering . Every nook of the hotel was clean. Not a single speck of dust could be found . Udaivillas is my recommendation forever now

reviews.name: Sonali
reviews.comments: You get yours money's worth while staying in the Oberoi Udaivilas considering the size of the properties, the attention to details and the nature included within and surrounding the property.

reviews.name: David
reviews.comments: This is one of the best hotels I've ever seen ! Fantastic ambience, beautiful garden, high quality interior and exterior design, the food is excellent, the night illumination creates a magic atmosphere, fascinating “jeux d’eau” everywhere And the room with semi-private swimming pool, with view on the lake and the Udaipur palaces is really fantastic

hotels.name: LAKE PICHOLA HOTEL
hotels.description: The car parking and the Wi-Fi are always free, so you can stay in touch and come and go as you please. Strategically situated in Lake City, allowing you access and proximity to local attractions and sights. Don't leave before paying a visit to the famous City Palace of Udaipur.

room_types.r1: Grande Heritage Garden View Room: 44 square meter
room_types.r2: Grand Heritage Garden View Room: 44 square meter
room_types.r3: Grande Heritage Lake View: 44 square meter
room_types.r4: Grande Heritage Lake View with Balcony: 44 square meter

reviews.name: Simran
reviews.comments: Lake Pichola is an unexpectedly excellent Hotel, Located on the Lake with an amazing view, Rooms were very big and Spacious, Hotel Location is right in the old streets of Udaipur which has lot of Shopping and some amazing Restaurants. Rooftop Restaurant in the hotel called UPRE is one of the best eating joints in Udaipur. We will surely book Lake Pichola again for our next Trip.

reviews.name: Vishnu
reviews.comments: This was one of the most memorable trips mostly due to the hotel stay and the beautiful location of this haveli. Everything around the hotel showcases so much history and rich culture. Would definitely recommend this to friends and family.

reviews.name: Salim
reviews.comments: I stayed there for 2 nights and it was worth it. We enjoyed alot and everything was as described. Also staff was very nice and helpful.

hotels.name: THE LEELA PALACE
hotels.address: Lake Pichola, PO Box 125, Lake City, Udaipur
hotels.description: Conveniently situated in the Lake City part of Udaipur, this property puts you close to attractions and interesting dining options. Don't leave before paying a visit to the famous City Palace of Udaipur. Rated with 5 stars, this high-quality property provides guests with access to restaurant, fitness center and spa on-site.

room_types.r2: Premier Rooms with Balcony : 65 square meter
room_types.r4: Deluxe Suites with Balcony : 92 square meter

reviews.name: Deepthi
reviews.comments: Excellent location & vell maintained hote very comfortable stay made memorable by the hospitality l very good food specially lavish breakfast and Very co-operative staff celebrated birthday and received a wonderful gesture from the staff well maintained garden

reviews.name: Sonali
